name: M17 Flyer
description:
M17 Flyer is a Galaxian/Galaga inspired space shooter game made in Unity. 

The player takes control of a remotely controlled ship that must destroy as many enemy ships as possible before being destroyed.

How To Play

The main objective of M17 Flyer is to survive as long as possible and achieve a high score.

Controls

Use WASD to move your ship and dodge enemy projectiles.

Credits

Developed by Raven Powless

Character Assets / Font - Kenney.nl

Main Menu Theme (Frozen Jam) - TGFCoder (CC-BY 3.0)

Additional Info

This game was originally made for android devices, however, it was modified to work in browser for accessibility. Some bugs are present in the game but shouldn't be game breaking. I may revisit this project some point in the future, but I would also likely start from scratch again.
